thread.title: The LIttle Shop of Horrors Opens Tonight
thread.title_full: The LIttle Shop of Horrors Opens Tonight

title: The LIttle Shop of Horrors Opens Tonight
text:
The LIttle Shop of Horrors Opens Tonight Tools 
  16, 2015 at 3:22 PM   16, 2015 at 3:22 PM EDT One of my Favorite musicals of all time, which I saw in its original incarnation in the 1980â€™s at the Orpheum Theater. Little Shop of Horrors runs for 10 performances at Central New York Playhouse, Syracuse October 16-31, 2015. Thursdays, Fridays, and Saturdays at 8pm, Sundays at 2pm. Plot: A deviously delicious Broadway and Hollywood sci-fi smash musical, LITTLE SHOP OF HORRORS has devoured the hearts of theatre goers for over 30 years. Howard Ashman and Alan Menken (Disney's THE LITTLE MERMAID, BEAUTY AND THE BEAST, and ALADDIN) are the creative geniuses behind what has become one of the most popular shows in the world. The meek floral assistant Seymour Krelborn stumbles across a new breed of plant he names "Audrey II" - after his coworker crush. This foul-mouthed, R&B-singing carnivore promises unending fame and fortune to the down and out Krelborn as long as he keeps feeding it, BLOOD. Over time, though, Seymour discovers Audrey II's out of this world origins and intent towards global domination!
